title: Customer Service Representative
aboutCompany: ABC Company is a dynamic and fast-growing technology startup headquartered in Calgary, Alberta, with a mission to redefine how businesses operate online. Fueled by a team of industry veterans and innovative thinkers, we specialize in designing and developing scalable, secure, and high-performance web solutions tailored to the unique needs of clients across e-commerce, healthcare, and logistics sectors. At the heart of ABC Company is a strong commitment to user-centered design and agile development methodologies. Our solutions are built with real users in mind — focusing on intuitive interfaces, responsive design, and clean, maintainable code. Whether we're creating a patient portal for a healthcare provider or optimizing a warehouse management dashboard for a logistics company, we aim to deliver results that are both technically robust and functionally elegant.
aboutJob: We are hiring a Web Development Intern for a full-time, paid remote internship. You will work alongside our senior developers and product team to support ongoing web application development, participate in feature sprints, and contribute to both front-end and back-end tasks.
responsibilities:
- Collaborate on the development of responsive web applications using React.js and Node.js
- Assist with bug fixes, feature implementation, and UI refinement
- Write clean, maintainable code and participate in code reviews
- Contribute to sprint planning, standups, and demo sessions
- Maintain Git branches and follow version control best practices
- Conduct basic testing and QA to ensure functionality and usability
requirements:
- Currently enrolled in or recently completed a program in Computer Science, Software Development, or related field
- Experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and at least one modern front-end framework (preferably React)
- Familiarity with REST APIs and version control systems (Git)
- Strong problem-solving skills and willingness to learn
- Able to work independently in a remote team environment
moreDetails:
This is a remote-first position; however, applicants must reside in Calgary, AB for occasional in-person team events.
Job Type: Full-time Internship
Pay: $30.00–$35.00 per hour
Schedule: Monday to Friday (flexible hours), 35–40 hours per week
benefits:
• Dental care – Coverage for routine cleanings, x-rays, and basic procedures
• Vision care – Reimbursement for annual eye exams and eyewear
• Health insurance – Basic health coverage including prescriptions and virtual care
• Remote work setup support – One-time stipend to help equip your home office
• Professional development – Access to online courses, technical workshops, and certification support
• Mentorship program – One-on-one mentorship with experienced developers
• Paid time off – Includes sick days and flexible vacation time (applicable to interns)
• Team perks – Monthly remote team socials, food delivery credits, and company merchandise


Opportunity for full-time – High-performing interns may be offered full-time roles upon completion
